A '''tuff wall''' is a [[tuff]] variant of a [[wall]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Tuff walls drop as an item if mined by any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{Breaking row|Tuff Wall|Pickaxe|Wood|horizontal=1}}

{{for|information about the placement mechanics of all walls|Wall#Usage}}

=== Note blocks ===
Tuff walls can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
